# Interface Condition

Defines conditions that trigger a goal activation or completion

This interface was referenced by `InworldBasicConfigurationSchema`'s JSON-Schema via the `definition` "Condition".

interface Condition {  
detect?: string;  
intents: string[];  
required_goals: string[];  
}

##### Index

### Properties

detect? intents required_goals

## Properties

### `Optional`detect

detect?: string

Text description of the condition that must be met

### intents

intents: string[]

List of intent identifiers that can trigger activation or completion

### required_goals

required_goals: string[]

List of goals that must be completed before this goal can be activated

### Settings

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
